metadata.title: AKS Network Policy Disabled or Missing
metadata.description: Detects when pods are deployed without network policies, allowing unrestricted network access.

properties.description: Detects namespaces where pods are deployed but no network policies exist, potentially allowing unrestricted network access.
properties.query:
// Get namespaces with pods
let NamespacesWithPods = KubePodInventory
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
| where PodStatus == "Running"
| distinct Namespace, ClusterName;
// Get namespaces with network policies
let NamespacesWithNetPol = AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "kube-audit"
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| extend log = parse_json(log_s)
| extend objectRef = log.objectRef
| where objectRef.resource == "networkpolicies"
| extend Namespace = tostring(objectRef.namespace)
| distinct Namespace, Resource;
// Find namespaces without policies
NamespacesWithPods
| join kind=leftanti (NamespacesWithNetPol) on Namespace
| where Namespace !in ("kube-system", "kube-public", "kube-node-lease", "gatekeeper-system", "azure-arc")
| project ClusterName, Namespace
| summarize Namespaces = make_set(Namespace) by ClusterName

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: The following namespaces in cluster '{{ClusterName}}' have running pods but no network policies: {{Namespaces}}
